scripts.env:pull: doppler secrets download --project agent-server --config dev --format env --no-file > .env
scripts.gcp:job:create: gcloud run jobs create agent-server --project fantasy-diary --region asia-northeast3 --image asia-northeast3-docker.pkg.dev/fantasy-diary/agent-server/agent-server:latest
scripts.gcp:job:update: gcloud run jobs update agent-server --project fantasy-diary --region asia-northeast3 --image asia-northeast3-docker.pkg.dev/fantasy-diary/agent-server/agent-server:latest
scripts.gcp:deploy: bun run gcp:build && bun run gcp:job:update
scripts.gcp:run:daily: gcloud run jobs execute agent-server --project fantasy-diary --region asia-northeast3 --args=--kind=daily
scripts.gcp:scheduler:run: gcloud scheduler jobs run agent-server-daily --project fantasy-diary --location asia-northeast3
